section.name: Description
section.p: The <javaNetCheckMember> task checks if an user has any (or specific) role in a given project.

tr.td: The name of the project to which a role is checked (e.g., "javanettasks")
The account name that performs the role grant operation. This account needs to have a permission to view roles in the given project. (e.g., "kohsuke")
The user name whose role is checked.

If specified, the task checks if the user has this role, and sets a property only when it's true. If not specified, the task checks if the user has any role at all, and sets a property only when he has any.
